datas.product: Nikon NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S Lens with Z Teleconverter TC-2.0X

about_this_item: Nikon NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S Lens - Z Teleconverter TC-2.0x - 95mm Snap-On Front Lens Cap (LC-95B) - Rear Lens Cap (LF-N1) - Lens Hood (HB-105) - Lens Case (CL-C5) - Tripod Foot - Nikon 1 Year Limited Warranty
The NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S is a super-telephoto prime lens designed for agility and speed, making it ideal for capturing decisive views of wildlife, sports, and aircraft
Weighing only 1160g, this lens is the smallest and lightest 400mm prime in its class, allowing you to travel light and shoot comfortably handheld with unwavering accuracy

Featuring premium optics and advanced technology, this S-Line lens delivers exceptional sharpness, clarity, and bokeh beyond f/4.5, with outstanding resolution that extends all the way to the frame edges

With up to 6.0 stops of built-in optical VR, this lens achieves an effect of shooting up to 6.0 stops faster on a camera that supports Synchro VR and 5.5 stops faster on all other Z cameras, allowing for smooth panning shots with confidence
details.product_descriptions: Super prime featherweightThe smallest, lightest 400mm prime in its class.Travel light and move fast. Comfortably shoot handheld with unwavering accuracy. Capture the sharpness and beautiful bokeh only a prime lens can deliver. The NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S is the super-telephoto prime for those who use agility and speed to nail decisive views of birds, wildlife, sports and aircraft. S-Line Premium Optics 400mm Super-Telephoto Prime 1160g Lightweight VR Image Stabilization (5.5 stops) 8.21 ft Close Focusing FX Full-Frame Z CamerasSuper-telephoto prime for the traveler.Just over 9 inches long and 2.5 lbs., the NIKKOR Z 400mm f/4.5 VR S pairs great with Z cameras and fits most gear bags and backpacks, so you can always have it on-hand.400mm. Bring the action to you.400mm is an ideal lens for birds, wildlife and action. It provides the massive reach you need to get closer with enough field of view to easily acquire and track fast subjects. Modes include Panorama1, Panorama + ePTZ, Divided Panorama, and Original for flexible viewing. Four IR LEDs provide a 66 foot (20 meter) illumination range. datas.product: AVer PTZ330N 30X NDI Live Streaming PTZ Camera

details.product_descriptions: AVer's PTZ330N NDI PTZ Live Streaming Camera is the latest camera with integrated NewTek NDI. It combines standard SDI and HDMI connections, as well as Ethernet/NDI network connectivity for HD video streaming, recording, and streaming. The PTZ330N can output HD video and audio while receiving control signal and power through a single connection. Pan, tilt, zoom, recording settings and more can also be adjusted remotely over Ethernet. NDI protocol, NewTek's innovative IP technology, gives you low-latency access to audio and video devices anywhere on your network for various A/V applications.

42.4MP of ultimate image quality: The RX1R II utilizes a 42.4MP back-illuminated 35mm full-frame Exmor R CMOS sensor paired with a powerful BIONZ X processing engine to achieve superior levels of image resolution and sensitivity (up to 102,4003) with a wide dynamic range.

World's first user-selectable optical variable low-pass filter: The RX1R II features the world's first1 optical variable low pass filter that allows photographers to achieve the desired image quality and resolution based on the presence of moire-inducing high spatial frequency objects in the scene

details.product_descriptions: Sony Palm-Sized RX1R II Camera with 42.4 MP Full-Frame Image Sensor Joining the original RX1 and RX1R cameras in the family of the world's smallest full-frame cameras, the RX1R II delivers the highest picture quality of any Sony compact camera ever made. This can largely be attributed to the new camera's high resolution 42.4 MP sensor paired with its large aperture, fixed focal length ZEISS Sonnar T* 35mm F2 lens, which have been fine-tuned to optimize performance together. Additionally, the RX1R II features a 30% improvement in AF response speed compared to the original award-winning RX1 models and is equipped with the world's first optical variable low pass filter that can be set to 'off', 'standard' or 'high' based on user preference, with low pass filter bracketing available. The camera also has a convenient retractable XGA OLED viewfinder for eye-level shooting, which has been implemented with minimal change in overall body size from its predecessors. Ultimate Image Quality in the Palm of Your Hand The RX1R II camera utilizes a back-illuminated 35mm full-frame Exmor R CMOS sensor with approx. 42.4 effective megapixels paired with a powerful BIONZ X processing engine to achieve superior levels of image resolution and sensitivity (ISO 100-25600, expandable to 50 - 1024002) with wide dynamic range. product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #1,788 in Camera & Photo Products (See Top 100 in Camera & Photo Products)#795 in Binoculars

details.product_descriptions: The Swarovski 10x42 NL Pure Binoculars are the middle magnification entry in the series, striking the perfect balance between power and handling, making them ideal for mid- to long-range applications.The NL Pure also employs extra-low dispersion (HD) glass elements and a range of proprietary optical coatings that, when combined with its other performance features, creates a set of glasses that delivers impressive image quality and durability. In keeping with its tradition of high-performance optics, Swarovski uses highly reflective roof prisms and fully multicoated fluorite-containing HD glass lenses to deliver superior image quality. A field-flattener lens system complements the glass and coatings to keep the edges of the view crisp and sharp. The resulting views are rich with detail and saturated with lifelike color with exceptional contrast and resolution.In addition to its high-transmission optical system, Swarovski also equips the NL Pure binoculars with a range of design elements that improve the handling experience. A re-engineered bridge and focus system provide smooth movement in a short configuration, so you have more of the optical tubes to grip. Covering the magnesium-alloy housing is Swarovski's iconic rubber armoring that provides impact protection and a positive grip where they are needed most. The housing is nitrogen-filled and O-ring sealed to be resistant to internal fogging and waterproof to a depth of 13 feet. Additional features like tethered front and rear caps, soap and brush cleaning kit, carrying case, and neck strap round out the thoughtful details that make the NL Pure stand out.Manufacturers Items Include:-Swarovski 10x42 NL Pure Binoculars-Cleaning Kit-Neck Strap-Carrying Case-1-Piece Ocular Rainguard-2 x Objective Lens Cover Filler Piece-2 x Objective Lens Connector-2 x Objective Lens CapsExtra Items From 6Ave:-Padded Backpack-Flashlight-6Ave Cleaning Kit

details.product_descriptions: This APO-Summicron-SL 28mm f/2 ASPH Lens from Leica is a versatile wide-angle prime designed for full-frame L-mount mirrorless cameras. The bright f/2 aperture strikes a balance between speed and overall weight and size, offering a portable form factor along with the ability to excel in available light conditions. Well-suited for everyday shooting as well as landscape and architectural applications, the lens excels in low-light conditions and is also characterized by its consistent sharpness and clarity throughout the aperture and focusing ranges. Additionally, the lens provides a minimum focusing distance of 9.4' and gives you the ability to separate the subject from the background at f/2 while maintaining maximum sharpness and extensive creative possibilities. Complementing the optics is a Dual Synchro Drive AF Motor, which delivers fast and quiet autofocus performance to suit both stills and video applications.Inside The Box:Leica APO-Summicron-SL 28mm f/2 ASPH LensLeica 67mm Clip-On Lens CapLeica SL Rear Lens CapLens HoodLens BagExtra Items From 6Ave:Padded Lens Case67mm 3-Piece Filter KitNeck StrapLens Cap KeeperCleaning Kit

details.product_descriptions: The NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S is a standard zoom lens that, when used with a full-frame (FX-format) camera, covers a convenient standard zoom range beginning at the wide-angle 24 mm and ending at the mid-telephoto 70 mm, all with a constant fast maximum aperture of f/2.8. This high-performance lens is part of the S-Line, a newly designated grade of NIKKOR Z lenses that adhere to a new benchmark in optical performance, creating new definitions of design principles and quality control. The NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S demonstrates excellent resolving power that maximizes the potential of high-pixel-count digital cameras like the Z 7, which has an effective pixel count of 45.7 megapixels. Color fringing is significantly minimized with the beautiful, large, natural bokeh unique to the f/2.8 aperture, which makes the lens perfect for shooting highly rendered photographs in a variety of scenes, such as portraits and landscapes, from the maximum aperture of f/2.8. Furthermore, the combination of the larger Z mount with its inner diameter of 55 mm, and a short flange focal distance of 16 mm has allowed the lens to achieve superior optical performance, as well as compactness and lightness for excellent portability. It also offers outstanding movie recording performance with focus breathing control and quiet operation. A multi-focusing system has been adopted as the AF drive system. Via the combination of multiple AF actuators, the position of the focus groups is precisely

datas.product: Panasonic AG-CX10 4K Camcorder + Padded Case, Sandisk Extreme Pro 128GB Memory Card, Lens Attachments, Wire Straps, LED Light, and More (Renewed)

about_this_item: Bundle Includes: 1 x Panasonic AG-CX10 4K Camcorder | 1 x SanDisk 128GB Extreme PRO UHS-I SDXC Memory Card | 1 x Professional LED 160 Video Light | 1 x 62mm 2X Professional Telephoto Lens | 1 x 0.45x Wide-Angle Lens (62mm, Black) | 1 x Soft Padded Carrying Case | 1 x 62mm 4-Piece +1 +2 +4 +10 Close-Up Macro Filter Set with Case | 1 x Cleaning Kit | 1 x Super-High Performance HDMI Cable 2 Meter | 1 x 62mm UV Filter | 1 x 6 x 6 inch Velcro Straps | 1 x Memory Card Wallet |...and more

IP Workflow - The AG-CX10 includes advanced IP networking features, such as built-in Wi-Fi support for HD live streaming to YouTube, Facebook, and other social sites via RTMP/RTMPS/RTSP protocols. In addition, the AG-CX10 includes an Ethernet connection for streaming and an NDI|HX connectivity for use in live production, as well as ROP tablet-based control.

Recording Options - The camera supports a variety of high-quality recording options using the Venus engine, including 4:2:2 10-bit internal recording with a maximum 29.97p in UHD, and a maximum 59.94p in FHD. When recording in 10-bit, the camcorder delivers 4K 60p 4:2:2 10-bit HDMI output. It also supports HEVC recording (LongGOP/10-bit 4:2:0/MOV) at 59.94p with a bit rate of 200 Mb/s. In addition to MOV, MP4, and AVCHD.

Lens - The wide-angle 24x optical lens offers a zoom range of 25 to 600mm (35mm-equivalent), and it features 32x iZoom in 4K and 48x iZoom in HD. Panasonic's exclusive high-precision AF also provides high-speed, accurate focusing for both 4K and Full HD shooting.

Manual Features - The AG-CX10 features two manual lens control rings, one for focus and the second switchable between zoom and iris. The two rings are different sizes, allowing you to identify each ring by feel so you don't have to look away from the shot to confirm you are using the correct ring. An integrated ND wheel enables rapidly, switching between clear, 2-stop, 4-stop, and 6-stop NDs. The removable top handle incorporates two 3-pin XLR audio inputs and a built-in LED video light.

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #938,899 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics)#4,225 in Camcorders

details.product_descriptions: Whether youre shooting for broadcast, behind the scenes (BTS), documentary, narrative, or live streaming in HD and would like to add 4K to your repertoire, the Panasonic AG-CX10 4K Camcorder can help balance your needs or allow you to jump straight to 4K. Compact and lightweight, the AG-CX10 shoots and records UHD 4K at broadcast-compatible frame rates, so it fits smoothly into your existing broadcast workflow. Additionally, it supports a full IP workflow including streaming, ROP control from an iPad or Android device, and an NDI/HX interface. The AG-CX10 features a 1/2.5' 8.29M MOS sensor that is always shooting at 4K resolution, the Venus processing engine to scale the 4K image for Full HD delivery, and both 3G-SDI and HDMI outputs. Audio is recorded in up to 24-bit PCM via the built-in microphone. standard 1/4'-20 socket on bottom of shoe

details.product_descriptions: Swarovski Optik ATX/STX/BTX 85mm Objective Lens Module gets an updated tripod shoe that fits Arca-Swiss quick release plates, and will accept any of the three available eyepiece modules: straight (STX) or angled-viewing (ATX), or the binocular viewer (BTX). The bayonet mount for the eyepiece modules is backward compatible with the original ATX/STX modules, to make it easy for users to upgrade their objectives without needing a new eyepiece module. This larger objective versus the 65mm model draws in more light and produces a larger exit pupil to improve its low-light capabilities and make it an invaluable companion from dawn to dusk.Optically, Swarovski combines the legendary image quality and world-class workmanship that nature enthusiasts, tactical professionals, and researchers have come to expect from the brand. The 85mm objective strikes a nice balance between light-gathering ability and portability, making it well suited for the hunter, outdoor enthusiast, or birder. Extra-low dispersion fluoride glass elements efficiently transmit all wavelengths of visible light, resulting in bright images that are color faithful, crisp, and rich with detail. An integrated field-flattener lens system corrects spherical aberrations to reveal crisp details at the edges of the view without distortion. SWARODUR and SWAROTOP coatings on all lenses and prisms minimize glare while maximizing contrast.Inside The Box:-Swarovski ATX/STX/BTX 85mm Objective Lens ModuleObjective Lens CapRear Bayonet Mount CapExtra Items From 6Ave:-Padded Backpack-Flashlight-6FT Tripod-6Ave Cleaning Kit

datas.product: Ikan Lyra Bi-Color 3200K-5600K Soft Pane (1) l 1 x 2 Studio & Field LED Light with DMX Control, Bi-Color Adjustable (LBx20) - Black

about_this_item: 95+ CRI Chip LEDs paired with 1/2 stop soft diffusion panel
Bi-Color adjustable from 3200K-5600K
Bright consistent light across all Color temperatures
Beam angle of soft panel 110 degrees
A clean single shadow without the artifacts
details.product_descriptions: Ikan's studio DMX brand of soft lights have high CRI chip LEDs paired with a soft panel, giving you a very soft wrapping light. Its bi-color adjustability from 3200K-5600K is great for any light setup. Also, the brightness of the light is consistent across all color temperatures. The beam angle of the light is a wide 110 degrees, making it possible to light a large area with a single fixture. The best thing about a Lyra soft light is the nice clean shadow you get from the light itself. The heavy duty yoke and baby 5/8'/junior 1 1/8' combo pin allow you to attach to any stand or use in any studio configurations. The quick set disk locking system allows professionals to lock the light in place when aiming the fixture. The large yellow knob on the back allows you to control the light with a few simple clicks. You can control the brightness, color temperature, and the DMX Channel, making adjustments as needed. The LED readout gives you the ability to have very precise measurements. The 1 x 2 LED soft panel is an extremely bright soft light that gives the end user the control to light sets or any scene on a stage. These lights are great for any talk show or broadcast new shows.

datas.product: Canon PowerShot G1 X Mark III Digital Camera (2208C001), 2 x 64GB Memory Card, 3 x NB13L Battery, Corel Photo Software, Charger, LED Light, Soft Bag + More (Renewed)

about_this_item: Bundle Includes: 1 x PowerShot G1 X Mark III Digital Camera, 2 x SanDisk 64GB Extreme PRO Cmemory Card, 3 x NB13L Replacement Battery, 1 x Corel Photo Software With PhotoMirage, AfterShot, Painter Essentials, PaintShop Pro, and Video Studio, 1 x NB13L Charger, 1 x Memory Card Reader, 1 x Led Light, 1 x Micro HDMI Cable, 1 x Soft Medium Camera and Video Case Bag, 1 x 12 inch Flexible Tripod, 1 x Hand Strap, 1 x Memory Card Wallet, 1 x Cleaning Kit

Raising the imaging bar for 's series of advanced compact cameras once again, the PowerShot G1 X Mark III is distinguished by its larger sensor and versatile all-around imaging capabilities. A first for a PowerShot, the G1 X Mark III sports a 24.2MP APS-C CMOS sensor and a DIGIC 7 processor to realize notable image clarity, a wide sensitivity range from ISO 100-25600, an impressive continuous shooting rate up to 9 fps, and Full HD 1080p/60 video recording.

The sensor's design also facilitates Dual Pixel CMOS AF, which offers quick and accurate phase-detection autofocus that benefits both stills and video applications. Balancing the improved sensor design is a versatile 3x zoom lens, which covers a 24-72mm equivalent focal length range to suit working in a variety of situations. An Optical Image Stabilizer is also featured, to minimize the appearance of camera shake for sharper imagery when shooting handheld.

In addition to the updated sensor and processor capabilities, the G1 X Mark III also features a refined physical design complete with a built-in 2.36m-dot OLED electronic viewfinder and a 3.0' vari-angle touchscreen for easier, more intuitive control. Dedicated dials about the camera body afford direct adjustment of shooting settings and modes, and both a pop-up flash and a hot shoe are available.

24.2MP APS-C CMOS Sensor - DIGIC 7 Image Processor - 3x Zoom Lens, 24-72mm (35mm Equivalent) - 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder - 3.0' Vari-Angle Touchscreen LCD - Full HD 1080p Video Recording at 60 fps - Dual Pixel CMOS AF, Image Stabilizer - ISO 25600, 9 fps Continuous Shooting - Built-In Wi-Fi with NFC, Bluetooth - Dust- and Water-Resistant Construction

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #773,630 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics)#3,389 in Camcorders

details.product_descriptions: The Panasonic AG-CX350 4K Camcorder is designed for what Panasonic is calling the fusion of communication and broadcasting. A compact professional UHD 4K camcorder packed with features that you would expect to find in a full-sized camcorder. The AG-CX350 features a 1' MOS sensor recording in UHD resolution (3840 x 2160), in the MOV format using a variety of data rates including 400 Mb/s, as well as in HEVC at up to 200 Mb/s. The camcorder can also record HD in MOV, as well as HD/SD in AVCHD format for legacy productions. You can choose from eight different gamma settings including HLG, which provides an HDR output in the camera. It also features variable frame rate capability from 1 to 60 fps in UHD and 1 to 120 fps in HD.Manufacturer Included Items:Panasonic AG-CX350 4K Camcorder7.28V 43Wh Lithium-Ion Battery for DVX200 (5,900mAh)Battery Charger & AC CableAC AdapterGrip BeltMicrophone HolderSet of Screws for Microphone HolderMicrophone Holder AdapterLens Hood (Attached to Camera Body)Bundle Items Include:1 x Panasonic AG-CX350 4K Camcorder1 x Sony ECM-VG1 Electret Condenser Shotgun Microphone1 x 7' Full HD Monitor with 4K Support1 x Wireless Lapel & Handheld Microphone System1 x 128GB SF-UY3 Series UHS-I SDXC Memory Card1 x Large Padded Carrying Case1 x Professional 160 LED Video Light Studio Series1 x 67mm Telephoto HD Lens1 x 67mm Wide Angle Lens with Pouch and Lens Caps1 x Professional Full Size Tripod1 x 67mm Close Up Filter Set, Diopters +1 +2 +4 +101 x 67mm 3 piece Lens Filter Kit (UV, Circular Polarizer, FLD)1 x 6 x 6 inch Velcro Straps (Assorted Colors)1 x Lens Cleaning Solution1 x Blower Brush1 x Microfiber Cloth1 x Lens Tissue Paper1 x 5pc Cotton Swabs1 x Lens Pen Cleaner1 x SD Card USB Reader1 x Memory Card Wallet
